sys_transform_map.name: Import Historic NeedIt Data

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_map_4218e00f07bf51104d58f16c7c1ed0ff
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>All Fields</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

    // 如果源数据中没有u_requested_for_email字段。
    // 从Requested for值中创建目标电子邮件地址。 电子邮件地址 
    //有格式firstname.lastname@example.com。 将u_requested_for 
    // 值转换成小写字母。 用.代替空格，然后连接为 
    // @example.com
    if (!("u_requested_for_email" in source)) {
        var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
        target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
    }
	
})(source, target, map, log, action === "update");]]></script><source_table>x_58872_needit_historic_needit_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-20 12:27:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>4218e00f07bf51104d58f16c7c1ed0ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_4218e00f07bf51104d58f16c7c1ed0ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-21 07:01:41</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_58872_needit_needit</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
